meanings.definition: The act of violating the sacredness of something.
meanings.sent1: The desecrations of the ancient temple deeply upset the villagers.
meanings.sent2: The desecrations of the church were met with outrage by the community.
meanings.sent3: The desecrations of the sacred site were like a slap in the face to the local traditions.
meanings.sent4: The desecrations of the holy ground echoed through the town like a thunderclap.
meanings.sent5: The desecrations of the shrine left a haunting mark on the peaceful village.

meanings.definition: The act of treating something with disrespect or irreverence.
meanings.sent1: His desecrations of the family heirloom caused a rift between relatives.
meanings.sent2: The desecrations of the war memorial were seen as a disgrace to the fallen soldiers.
meanings.sent3: The desecrations of the museum artifacts were like a comedy of errors.
meanings.sent4: Her desecrations of the rules were a bold rebellion against authority.
meanings.sent5: The desecrations of the traditions were like tearing pages from a cherished book.
